description: Details required by Condition 2 (submission of details - a) cornices, b) skirting, c) internal joinery, d) terrace boundary, treatment/fencing) of Listed Building consent LB/19/07746 (Reinstatement/ alteration of the property, following extensive fire damage to both the interior and exterior - works include : opening up and enlarging the entrance lobby area - maintaining double glazing system and introducing internal secondary glazing on Queen's Gate - replacing the terrace doors - replacing skirting and cornices - alteration of the stairwell, to increase the staircase landing and remove the turn in the stair treads - adding a low level sink in the fifth floor terrace - enlarging the skylight - straightening the stairway to roof (at the back of the roof terrace / skylight), to accommodate the larger sized skylight, also to increase the safe usable roof terrace space - rationalisation of services under the roof, to create extra usable space on the roof terrace - remove any trellis etc and replace them with handrail)
